data.title: Prince of Persia Trilogy 3D [BLUS30754]
data.text:
08-08-2018, 03:47 PM -

RPCS3 v0.0.5-7161-69af60749 Alpha | HEAD

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time: black screen only after starting a new game.

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within:

Quote:Â·F 0:00:45.125196 {PPU[0x100000d] Thread (DynamicLoader) [0x007eb2f8]} MEM: Access violation reading location 0xb5e953d3

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones: ingame with graphic bugs.

Attached Files

RPCS3.7z (Size: 398.74 KB / Downloads: 49)

10-15-2022, 05:17 PM -

Any way to enable ingame 60 fps in these? Any patch or config?

EDIT: Setting VBLANK to 120 doesn't affect it. Setting frame limiter to infinite also doesn't. Sands of Time runs at 60 fps originally, but the other 2 games don't.

This post was last modified: 10-25-2022, 02:54 AM by vlbastos.

11-19-2022, 01:02 AM -

(10-15-2022, 05:17 PM)vlbastos Wrote: Any way to enable ingame 60 fps in these? Any patch or config?

EDIT: Setting VBLANK to 120 doesn't affect it. Setting frame limiter to infinite also doesn't. Sands of Time runs at 60 fps originally, but the other 2 games don't.

Thank you very much, Jao, for your unlock FPS patches!!!

This post was last modified: 11-19-2022, 01:02 AM by vlbastos.

11-19-2022, 01:12 AM -

it seems i cant get the Unlock FPS to work. ive ticked Unlock FPS in Patches, Vblank to 120 and 240, but still stuck at 30 FPS

my conf:

AMD R5 3600x

nvidia 1660

can i have your setting for RPCS3 @vlbastos?

This post was last modified: 11-19-2022, 01:13 AM by ryu_joko. Edit Reason: asking for setting
